title: Hackers used Tornado Cash to launder money, costing Prism Finance $11.6 million
description: Prisma Finance was the victim of an attack targeting its DeFi platform, netting hackers $11.6 million in the middle of a complex cyberspace. title: Bank Lets Customers Withdraw More Than Available Balance, Triggering $14,000,000 Exodus in Matter of Hours: Report
description:
A state-owned bank is clawing back millions of dollars from customers after a “routine system update” allowed people to take out more money than they had in their accounts. The Commercial Bank of Ethiopia (CBE) says $14 million was drained in a matter of hours as news of the bank’s malfunctioning system spread quickly among […]
